alert.note: Alert for Allen; Logan; Simpson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 12:44PM EDT until June 29 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Logan County in south central Kentucky... Simpson County in south central Kentucky... Allen County in south central Kentucky... Southeastern Warren County in south central Kentucky... * Until 1215 PM CDT. * At 1143 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Elkton to 10 miles south of Memphis Junction to Plum Springs, moving southeast at 35mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. moved out of the warned area. **! * Locations impacted include... Bowling Green, Russellville, Scottsville, Plum Springs, Mount Victor, Adairville, Woodburn, Hardcastle, Black Jack and Crossroad. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle thromoved out of the warned area. **!ugh flooded roadways.
